attributes.action: Petition to rearrange all Graduations and Grad balls in UK instead of cancelling
attributes.additional_details: I am asking for the government to have a say and reinforce the idea to universities because you have a bit influence on the population. And although Universities are private from you I think you can promote and influence the idea to rearrange all graduations. This is as opposed to cancelling them.
attributes.background: Enforce Universities to rearrange Graduations and Grad balls in the UK. It is not fair under any of the circumstances that universities fully cancel all graduations. Students work exceptionally hard to graduate and that should be celebrated.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This would be a decision for individual institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.
